title: Cody Simpson posts a selfie from 'move in day' as things get serious with Miley Cyrus
text:
Things seem to be getting serious between Miley Cyrus and her new beau Cody Simpson.

After serenading her while she was hospitalized with tonsillitis, Simpson recently released a song he wrote about Cyrus.

Now, the Aussie is moving into a new place, which obviously makes us wonder if he has a new popstar roommate we might have heard of.

Moving day: Miley Cyrus's new beau Cody Simpson took to his Instagram story Tuesday to share a selfie with the caption: 'move in day'

Simpson took to his Instagram story Tuesday to share a selfie with the caption: 'move in day.'

He stood in a bare room with surfboards and framed photos propped against the walls.

Sources recently told People that Cyrus and Simpson are deeply focused on each other and their ongoing efforts with sobriety as he teased his new song about the popstar titled Golden Thing.

Simpson's manager Matt Zeidman said: 'It is early, but their friendship is long-standing and deeper than people realize.

Getting serious: Sources recently told People that Cyrus and Simpson are deeply focused on each other and their ongoing efforts with sobriety

Sober pals: Simpson's manager Matt Zeidman said: 'It is early, but their friendship is long-standing and deeper than people realize. Though they originally met during their own wilder phases, they're both sober now and are focused on health, work and spending time together. Seems pretty ideal to me'

In sync: Simpson recently revealed during the Tiffany & Co. Men's launch that they 'found each other again in a space where we're both not partying' and 'working real hard'

'Though they originally met during their own wilder phases, they're both sober now and are focused on health, work and spending time together. Seems pretty ideal to me.'

Simpson recently revealed during the Tiffany & Co. Men's launch that they 'found each other again in a space where we're both not partying' and 'working real hard.'

He definitely seems enamored with his new love interest as he shared an update about a song she persuaded him to release: 'golden thing. friday.'

Love song: He definitely seems enamored with his new love interest as he shared an update about a song she persuaded him to release: 'golden thing. friday'

His muse: The 22-year-old penned the sweet song for Cyrus while she was hospitalized for tonsillitis last week

Simpson said: 'She was like, "If you don't put this s*** out, I'm putting it out on your behalf for you. I'm getting your Spotify login and doing this s*** myself,.'"

The 22-year-old penned the sweet song for Cyrus while she was hospitalized for tonsillitis last week.

Cyrus recently ending things with husband Liam Hemsworth, before a brief fling with Kaitlynn Carter.
description: Sources recently said that Cyrus and Simpson are deeply focused on each other and their ongoing efforts with sobriety: 'It is early, but their friendship is long-standing and deeper than people realize.'
